snippet: The attorney general testified for the sixth time on Operation Fast and Furious, a gun-trafficking investigation that ended after the death of an A.T.F. agent.
abstract: Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr testifies for the sixth time about the disputed investigation into Operation Fast and Furious, a gun trafficking network based out of Arizona, that ended after the death of an ATF agent; Republicans rip into Mr Holder, accusing the Justice Department of a 'cover-up' and declaring that senior officials either knew or should have known about the use of 'gunwalking,' the tactic of failing to seize illegal weapons in order to build a bigger case.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general testified for the sixth time on Operation Fast and Furious, a gun-trafficking investigation that ended after the death of an A.T.F. agent.

headline.seo: Republicans Press Holder Further Over Botched Gun Operation
headline.main: Further Pressure on Holder Over Failed Gun Operation
headline.print_headline: Further Pressure on Holder Over Failed Gun Operation

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
